<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660f-9a88-4280-2949-9d472575019b#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Albrecht Dürer: A nyuszika, 1502, Graphische Sammlung Albertina, Bécs, 25x23 cm, akvarell, papír.</string>
            <string language="en">Albrecht Dürer: Bunny, 1502, Graphische Sammlung Albertina, Vienna, 25x23 cm, aquarelle, paper.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Albrecht Dürer: Häschen, 1502, Graphische 
Sammlung Albertina, Wien, 25x23 Zentimeter, aquarelle, Papier.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Albrecht Dürer : Lapin, 1502, Graphische 
Sammlung Albertina, Vienne, 25x23 centimètre, aquarelle, papier.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Albrecht Dürer: Bunny, 1502, Graphische 
Sammlung Albertina, Viena, 25x23 cm, aquarelle, papel.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Albrecht Dürer: Coniglietto, 1502, 
Graphische Sammlung Albertina, Vienna, 25x23 centimetro, aquarelle, 
carta.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Αλψρεθχτ Dόrer: Bunny, 1502, 
Graphische Sammlung Αλμπερτίνα, Βιέννη, 25x23 εκατ., 
ακουαρέλα, έγγραφο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Albrecht Dürer: Conejito, 1502, Graphische
Sammlung Albertina, Viena, 25x23 centímetro, aquarelle, papel.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Mander Festőkönyvében Dürerrről már mint majdnem héroszról ír, aki korában kimagaslott tehetségével.</string>
            <string language="en">Mander writes in his Book of Painters about Dürer as an almost hero, who stands out with his talent in his age.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">tehetség,  Mander,  Festőkönyv,  16. század,  tanulmány,  nyuszika,  reneszánsz,  </string>
            <string language="en">talent, Mander, Paintersbook, 16th century, essay, bunny, the Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mander schreibt in sein Buch der Maler über Dürer als 
fast Held, der heraus mit seinem Talent in seinem Alter steht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mander écrit en son livre des peintres au sujet de Dürer
en tant que presque héros, qui se tient dehors avec son talent dans 
son âge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mander escreve em seu livro dos pintores sobre Dürer como
quase um herói, que esteja para fora com seu talent em sua idade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mander scrive in suo libro dei pittori circa Dürer come 
quasi hero, che si leva in piedi fuori con il suo talento nella sua 
età.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Mander γράφει στο βιβλίο ζωγράφων του για 
Dόrer ως σχεδόν ήρωας, ο οποίος ξεχωρίζει με το ταλέντο του 
στην ηλικία του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mander casi escribe en su libro de pintores sobre Dürer 
como héroe, que está parado hacia fuera con su talento en su edad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Talent, Mander, Paintersbook, 16. Jahrhundert, Versuch, 
Häschen, die Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">talent, Mander, Paintersbook, 16ème siècle, essai, lapin, la 
Renaissance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">talent, Mander, Paintersbook, 1õ século, essay, bunny, o 
renascimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">talento, Mander, Paintersbook, sedicesimo secolo, saggio, 
coniglietto, la rinascita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταλέντο, Mander, Paintersbook, 16$ος αιώνας, δοκίμιο, 
bunny, η αναγέννηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">talento, Mander, Paintersbook, décimosexto siglo, ensayo, 
conejito, el renacimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        </educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
